name: Big Brother
greetingText: Hen happy to know you in Shenzhen!
wishText: May haoshi always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: 和所有的烦恼说拜拜，和所有的快乐说嗨嗨！Happy birthday to you!! Yeee!
text2: That's what I cengjing jingliguo de.
text3: But Big Brother you really perform well!
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Heihei dengwo huiguo yiqi chuqu wanshua.
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
